channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 05:11 Fragrant anxiety in the Uman District.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 游릭 05:11 Fragrant anxiety in the Uman District.Creck on Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
